mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title},#{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set tile=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT from tbl_board where BNO > 0 order by BNO DESC
